revised_title: Advanced Materials and Predictive Design in the 1990s
tldr: The article discusses the evolution of materials and design methods in the 1990s, emphasizing the importance of advanced materials like high-strength polymers, ceramics, and structural composites. It highlights the limitations of continuum modeling and the potential of atomistic modeling to contribute to predictive design. The author also explores the role of computer power in modern design and the need for innovation in materials selection.
